name: Western Sahara Resource Watch
goal: WSRW's principal purpose is to monitor and comment about the taking of natural resources from the Non-Self-Governing-Territory of Western Sahara, and to address related human rights abuses and environmental protection issues.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: International Trade, Development, Fisheries, Human Rights, Foreign Affairs, Consumer Affairs
